text: Data of class activities may be provided to the research institute during its research, only after receiving agreement from the school or the teacher.

The Company also frequently makes back-up copies of the personal information in case of deterioration, prevents leakage or damage of the information by using the latest vaccine programs, and uses encrypted communication to facilitate safe transmission of personal information on the network.
Google will evaluate and use website activity reports in order to improve Classting's functionality and user experience.

If we learn we have collected personal information from a student under 13 without parental consent being obtained by his or her school, district, and/or teacher, or if we learn a student under 13 has provided us personal information beyond what we request from him or her, we will delete that information as quickly as possible.
